attributes.review: This app is hot a*s garbage❤️

The fact that this app is so awful in every way is an exact representation of the Trump administration and how the president is running this country. I cannot stress enough how awful the app is and how bad of an idea it is to download this onto your phone. Also I am pretty sure it is just another way for China to spy on us Americans.⭐️

attributes.review: This app if full of bullying. This app doesn’t let Trans people have health care just because they are who they are. This app watches Black people die just for being Black, then when Black people say something this app says that they are “sick of the race card”. This app doesn’t allow people of the LGBTQ+ community foster children so those children don’t get homes, then say abortion is bad they can just be adopted. This app also puts children in cages just for wanting the “American dream” this app it horrible. This app thinks it can praise the people who STOLE this land but not the people who had it first. This app will call a virus the “Chinese virus” knowing that will make its followers attack Asian people. This app will not win, this app will lose, I mean look a bunch of children are beating him, and WE WILL WIN. NO JUSTICE NO PEACE✊🏻✊🏼✊🏽✊🏾✊🏿

attributes.review: I was sitting on tiktok when a video popped up on my fyp telling everyone to go give this app a one star. Since I’m so smart I wanted to go and do it but apparently you have to download this stupid app before you can rate it. After I downloaded I wanted to check it out but danold trump some how started texting me. He told me to look out my window but I was so scared bc it’s dark outside. When I looked outside I saw an orange glow in the distance slowly moving towards me. IT WAS HIM. Danald trump had come to my house and started looking in my window. I’m only 15 and I don’t want to be raped by him. He licked his finger and started rubbing it on the window. I think he was trying to ✨seduce✨me. I was not having it, I went outside and told him to leave my property but he said “we have to make America great again, together. And I was like ew so I’m currently in the back of a black van if anyone wants to come find me. Don’t come looking for me if I say I found his son bc mannnnnnn his son is 🔥HOT🔥anyways I’ll update y’all if I make it out alive
attributes.title: The orange man 🍊 👨🏽
